resources.string: "Click the button below to start the game or click the information icon to read the game guide."
When you start the game, a random category will be chosen for you.
You can choose a new category by using the dropdown menu.
Or you can have the app choose a random category for you!
You win the game by guessing all of the letters!
You lose the game by losing all of your lives.
Spin the wheel using the button below.
You have used all of your lives and lost the game. Please restart or exit the game.
You guessed the word and won the game! Please restart or exit the game.
